plot: Death flies in to collect the soul of a murdered young woman, but first takes revenge on her killer. After replacing all of the incriminating evidence -- the bullets, the smoking gun, even the murderer's fingerprints -- Death takes a moment to place a very special phone call. Here the supernatural vengeance truly begins.
title: My Skin!
